name: Glass (WardDheer)
description:
G L A S S

A small first person altgame that takes roughly 3 minutes to play.

A game about change and being changed.

Enjoy x

WASD to Walk
Escape to Quit the Game

Thank you for playing! It means a lot to me.

Want to keep up to date with my game dev shizzle?
Follow me on twitter @Ward_Sil
